note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from infectious diseases
subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths from HIV/AIDS, diarrhea, malaria, respiratory infections, and all other infectious diseases per 100,000 people.
internalNotes:
This variable no longer exists in the GBD but has been split into: 

* HIV/AIDS and STIs
* Respiratory infections and tuberculosis
* Enteric infections
* Neglected tropical diseases and malaria
* Other infectious diseases

For this variable we have summed up the above variables.
